About Me

Let me tell you about me and what I do.

Your project is in safe hands

I am a self-taught web developer. I have been programming since 2018. I got started programing through a bootcanp called YearUp Greater Atlanta. Here I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript and SQL. Then, I earned an internship at Equifax for six months. Then, I graduated from Kennesaw State University with a Bachelors of Science in Information Technology. I continue to develop my skills in programming by building multiple projects. In my down time when I am not programming I like to watch Anime, read, play video games and listening to music.
